title: One for the Road
description: 1948. LAS VEGAS. JOHNNY FLAMINGO COMES TO TOWN AND NOIR NEVER LOOKED SO DARK.When a drifter arrives in 1948 Las Vegas, he finds a local casino overrun by two feuding factions of the same organized crime outfit. Looking for trouble and profit, he decides to play both sides against each other. After all, it is a city made for gambling. But will the dimwitted mafiosi prove too clever for him? And will this anchorless, morally flexible drifter let his emotions get in his way?
author: Edgar J. Rossi
